question_text: What would most likely happen if a networkâ€™s NTP service fails and devices have unsynchronized clocks?
answer_options: Printers will stop accepting print jobs
Log file timestamps will become inconsistent, affecting correlation
Bandwidth will increase across all subnets
correct_answer: Log file timestamps will become inconsistent, affecting correlation
explanation: Inconsistent system clocks disrupt event correlation in SIEM systems, making security analysis and incident response difficult.
